quotes.txt: I avoid that bleak first hour of the working day during which my still sluggish senses and body make every chore a penance. I find that in arriving later, the work which I do perform is of a much higher quality.
quotes.author: Ignatius J. Reilly

quotes.txt: [â€¦] death, destruction, anarchy, progress, ambition, and self-improvement were to be Piers' new fate. And a vicious fate it was to be: now he was faced with the perversion of having to GO TO WORK.
quotes.author: Ignatius J. Reilly
